а игра за выжившего - это 2 главных героя из фильма,
и можно придумать новую карту в стиле лондонского метро.

and playing for the survivor is 2 main characters from the movie,

Городские...Ненавижу, блядь, городских!!
С тех пор как эту турбазу открыли совсем спокойной жизни нет!
Давеча, вот, четверо таких вломились ко мне во двор, пьяные, бегают, шумят В капканы мои лезут!Для них это игра, чёрт возьми!А я тут между прочим охочусь!Живу я тут!Мне некогда бегать за ними и просить вежливо уйти, я хочу посмотреть фильмец и попить чашечку чая.Нет же, приходится ловить бухих туристов, и вешать на крючки, чтобы протрезвели и в капканы не угодили. Так ещё что удумали, генераторы мои старые на цвет.мет, видимо, разбирают,Да им же 30 с лишним лет! Как дед помер, так и к ним никто и не подходил. это же опасно! Я как то залез в один такой, теперь не рожа- а месиво, Проще новый купить, так эти, чёрт бы их побрал, лезут, их прогонишь-опять бегут. Даже не слушают, носятся, орут, в туалете прячутся, прямо перед носом деревянные щиты кидают, все ноги отдавили. Приходится рукоприкладствовать..Ну а что сделаешь? По-другому же не понимают. Нда...Опять, кажется, вандалы, залезли. Слышу кто-то в сундуке роется, пойду посмотрю....

ずっと前から存在は知ってて、でも怖いし絶対やらないだろうなと思っていたのですが、友達に誘われて「半額だし1回だけ」なんて思ってたら結構ハマってしまいました。始める前はホラー要素に不安がありましたが、その点は慣れました。怖いは怖いけど。キラーをすることに抵抗がありしばらくやらなかったのですが、これも慣れました。1人陣営なので協力する必要がなく下手でも気楽にできていいかなとさえ思ってしまいました。グラフィックで抵抗を感じているだけであれば一度試してみてもらいたいです。

Clarity wrong 
Kekw

Behavior isn't a video game developer, they're a video game company. Whether you buy the game and play for 2 hours or buy it and play for 500, you bought the game once and that's all that matters to them. They'll keep you around and confused with absurd balance changes while they slap a new licensed killer into the game for new players to oggle at.

The game has no anti-cheat. Easy anti-cheat is as much of an anti-cheat system as a single square of thin gas station toilet paper is toilet paper. You know it's there, but you don't feel like it is, and it's a shitty situation that you're gonna have to wash your hands of eventually. The game has no internal checks for cheaters. They can do the most obvious shit that a single If/Then line of code could detect. Basic goo goo ga ga baby shit that a 12 year old with a functioning pair of eyes could see as wrong, like survivors flying around the map and clipping through walls. Pretty sure the game is supposed to depict the slasher genre slightly more than cosmic horror.

Basic things that any games company could implement in a matter of hours, like a simple colorblind filter, are an impossible task for the developers. And don't think you can get a sensible response from them outside of the devs putting their fingers in their ears and shouting until you leave.

There are so many things in this game that need an update. Trapper, the main icon of the game, is ironically one of the weakest and most outdated killers in the roster. He's such a product of his time that you'd think he was designed without survivor perks in mind. Wasting so much time just setting up a power that barely provides any payoff unless you're extremely skilled with it. Newer killers get these fancy kill animations where the older ones just slap the survivor with their blade a few times. Half of the perks in the game are just plain bad, or should get combined. A few of them are even a straight detriment to the player.

I think the worst part for me is just the amount of time it takes to get any decent builds in this game. Assuming you only want to get to level 40 with each killer in order to get their respective perks, you'd need about 1.3 million bloodpoints for each killer. There are 27 killers in the game. That's 35 million bloodpoints just to get every perk unlocked, let alone getting all the perks for one killer. Let's assume you get 26k bloodpoints every game. Pretty decent, and assuming you don't use anything that boosts your gain. That's 1350 games that you need to get every perk. If each game is 20 minutes long, that's 450 hours of nonstop gameplay just to unlock every killer's perk. Now you're ready to start dumping even more bp into each killer just to get them to prestige 3 and then get them every perk in the game. If you want to be able to slap any 4 perks together on whatever killer you feel like playing, you'll have to wait until you're so burned out from playing the game that you can tell what color underwear a player is wearing just by watching them play. Yes, I know that players are gonna be running BBQ&Chili and whatever other stuff to boost their bp gain, but the amount of time it takes to get to a point where players have the freedom to choose to play with what they want is ridiculous. By the time you get to where the game can start being really fun, it stops being fun.
Wake up. You're in a coma. This is the only way we can communicate this to you. Nothing you see is real. It's all in your head. Please, wake up.

Anyway in conclusion, the game is dumb and I'm not playing it anymore. Until I do, but don't think I'll enjoy it. Which I will sometimes but most of the time I definitely wont.

I got lots of play time on the game and to say the least its fun but it can also be very annoying sometimes. all around its a good game that will take alot of time to master but when you start getting good at the game you can really feel it and it feels good to outplay your enemy in this game.

Even though I give this game a thumbs down, I still like it cause at times, it can be fun, damn fun! But the big problem is that this game is infested with people at ruin it, mainly the killers. Most games nowadays goes are no longer fun because killers have now gotten the mindset that they can just camp, tunnel, or slug the survivors, effectively ruining the experience for everyone except them, and the devs don't do anything to try and resolve this issue. Now, don't get me wrong, there are toxic survivors out there, but most toxic survivors I've seen go toxic because of how scummy the killers are. 

I have patience, and most time I'm able to go maybe 4 rounds of having these toxic killers, but when its constant, its not longer fun and I find myself more and more not liking the game, especially since the devs kinda encourge this dirty play style.

Dead by Daylight, its a good game, but the playerbase ruins it, and its legit a simple few fixes on the devs part, but sadly I believe we'll never see them come around.

Edit, April 26th 2022: I'm officially handing in my DBD resignation notice, I am done with this game as of now as it is basically lost all fun factor now. So long Dead by Twatlight.
